title: [BUG] Tool display shows hallucinated name instead of sanitized
description: When model hallucinates tool names like find_files_matching_pattern, the display shows the hallucinated name even though we sanitize it internally. Should show 'glob' not the hallucinated name.

logs.msg: Root cause: Not a current bug. Error message is from historical session data stored before sanitization aliasing was added. Display correctly shows 'glob' (sanitized), but the stored error from the original execution contains the hallucinated name. New tool calls work correctly.
